    • Method Detail

      • transfer

        @Produces(value="application/json")
 @POST
 @Path(value="/transfer/{accountType}/{toAccountId}/{fromAccountId}/{amount}")
public Result transfer(@PathParam(value="accountType")
                                                                                                                                                    java.math.BigDecimal accountType,
                                                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="toAccountId")
                                                                                                                                                    java.math.BigDecimal toAccountId,
                                                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="fromAccountId")
                                                                                                                                                    java.math.BigDecimal fromAccountId,
                                                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="amount")
                                                                                                                                                    java.math.BigDecimal amount)
        Parameters:
        accountType - : Type of account USD:1, EUR:2
        toAccountId - : Unique Id of the requester account
        fromAccountId - : Unique Id of the sender account
        amount - : Amount of the money to transfer
        Returns:
        JSON String of the Result object Result This rest end point responsibility is to transfer money from the account to another account.

      • deposit

        @Produces(value="application/json")
 @POST
 @Path(value="/deposit/{accountType}/{toAccountId}/{deposit}")
public Result deposit(@PathParam(value="accountType")
                                                                                                                                   java.math.BigDecimal accountType,
                                                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="toAccountId")
                                                                                                                                   java.math.BigDecimal toAccountId,
                                                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="deposit")
                                                                                                                                   java.math.BigDecimal deposit)
        Parameters:
        accountType - : Type of account USD:1, EUR:2
        toAccountId - : Unique Id of the requester account
        deposit - : Amount of the money to deposit
        Returns:
        JSON String of the Result object Result This rest end point for the test-purpose. You can deposit the account. If system not found the account than system will create automatically.

      • findAccount

        @Produces(value="application/json")
 @GET
 @Path(value="/account/{accountType}/{accountId}")
public Result findAccount(@PathParam(value="accountType")
